item.title: Fujifilm_as_webcam
item.description: How to use your XT1/2/3/4 fujifilm camera as webcam for your ubuntu 22.04. This is a simple guide to use your fujifilm camera as a webcam. Installation: 1 sudo apt-get install gphoto2 v4l2loopback-utils v4l2loopback-dkms ffmpeg modprobe setup 1 2 3 sudo modprobe -r v4l2loopback sudo modprobe v4l2loopback exclusive_caps=1 max_buffers=2 check video sources 1 ls -l /dev/video* Make sure there is no gphoto process already running: 1 ps aux | grep gphoto check is camera is detected by gphoto2:
